How to sell your vehicle?

Sell your Tesla the easy way.

Trade-In

Get the fair value

We know Teslas better than most and we will offer the fair value and apply the credit to the new purchase.

Sell

Faster turn around

We evaluate your car in person, and buy without any obligation to buy from us, and we payoff all outstanding loans.

Consignment

Let us do the hard work

We are experts in selling preowned Teslas and we market vehicles on many platforms across the country.
